text: Anata gata shinkō suru mono yo, shūkai no ori ni (hiroku) seki o ake nasai to iwa reta toki wa, sugu seki o yuzure. Arrā wa anata gata no tame ni (jūbun'na) seki o atae rareru. Mata tachinoboru yō iwa reta toki wa, sugu tate. Arrā wa anata gata no naka shinkō suru mono ya, chishiki o sadzuke rareta mono no ikai o age rareru. Hontōni arrā wa, anata gata no okonau issai o jukuchi nasa reru
